Class Security

  • java.lang.Object
    • Security

  • class Security
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles security related tasks on behalf of Messenger, interacts with the javax.crypto and java.security libraries

      • createPub

        public void createPub(byte[] otherPubEnc,
                      CommunicationInterface other)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Second step in diffie-hellman protocol, take a public key and generate our own, send to the other party to create a shared secret
        Parameters:
        otherPubEnc - other party's public key
        other - object of other party
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • share

        public void share(byte[] otherPubEnc,
                  byte[] otherParams)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Third step in diffie-hellman protocol, take a public key and create a shared secret, take cipher params and use secret to create a cipher
        Parameters:
        otherPubEnc - other party's public key
        otherParams - other party's cypher paremeters
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • compareCheckSum

                                java.lang.String message)
        Compare two checksums
        Parameters:
        checksum - checksum to check
        message - message to confirm same as checksum
        Returns:
        true if same, false otherwise

                     throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        id - id of user to authenticate
        pass - attempted password to authenticate
        Returns:
